response.overview: Astronaut Taylor crash lands on a distant planet ruled by apes who use a primitive race of humans for experimentation and sport. Soon Taylor finds himself among the hunted, his life in the hands of a benevolent chimpanzee scientist.
response.tagline: Somewhere in the Universe, there must be something better than man!
response.title: Planet of the Apes

titles.title: บุกพิภพมนุษย์วานร
